Meet IDE Technologies! This member of our PartnerNetwork used our digital twin technology to revolutionize maintenance for the water desalination industry. Desalination plants use a reverse osmosis process that passes seawater through a membrane to remove salt and other impurities. A common problem desalination plants face is biofouling - when the membrane gets clogged by materials, especially seasonal plant blooms. postcontent: Meet IDE Technologies! This member of our PartnerNetwork used our digital twin technology to revolutionize maintenance for the water desalination industry. Desalination plants use a reverse osmosis process that passes seawater through a membrane to remove salt and other impurities. A common problem desalination plants face is biofouling - when the membrane gets clogged by materials, especially seasonal plant blooms.
